description.zh-CN: 1940-50年代黑色电影美学，融合高对比度黑白色调、戏剧性阴影和神秘氛围。灵感来自经典侦探电影，营造悬疑、优雅的视觉体验。完美适用于神秘、侦探主题或需要强烈视觉冲击的应用。
description.en-US: Inspired by 1940s-50s detective films, combining high-contrast black and white, dramatic shadows, and mysterious atmosphere. Creates suspenseful and elegant visual experiences. Perfect for mystery, detective themes, or applications requiring strong visual impact.
